summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's Caterpillar Trust for the period of March 1 to March 31, 2019. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and account balances, highlighting significant transactions including a $10 million transfer and other outgoing funds.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder of the Caterpillar Trust at Deutsche Bank, with significant transactions recorded in the statement.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfickt
persons.context: Steuart Oldfickt is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Statement Period Begins
events.description: The financial statement covers transactions starting from March 1, 2019.

events.title: Account Statement Period Ends
events.description: The financial statement concludes with the account balance as of March 31, 2019.

events.title: Large Deposit
events.description: A deposit of $10,000,000.00 was made into the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing transfers were made from the account, including $2,121,318.85 and $58,723.73.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas, 00802, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank for Jeffrey Epstein's Caterpillar Trust.
The account had a beginning balance of $50.00 and significant transactions included a $10 million deposit and multiple outgoing transfers.
The statement covers the period from March 1 to March 31, 2019.
Steuart Oldfickt is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
The document includes details about service charges and overdraft fees.
